member.name: T:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.ChartHitTestInfo
member.summary: Contains information about a part of a FlexChart control at a specified coordinate.

members.member:
Initializes a new instance of a @see:ChartHitTestInfo object.
@param chart The chart control.
Gets the point in control coordinates to which this ChartHitTestInfo object refers to.

member.summary: Gets the chart series at the specified coordinates.

member.summary: Gets the data point index at the specified coordinates.

member.summary: Gets the chart element at the specified coordinates.

member.name: P:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.ChartHitTestInfo.Distance
member.summary: Gets the distance from the closest data point.

member.summary: Gets the data object that corresponds to the closest data point.

member.summary: Gets the x-value of the closest data point.

member.name: P:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.ChartHitTestInfo.Y
member.summary: Gets the y-value of the closest data point.

member.name: P:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.ChartHitTestInfo.Percentage
member.summary: Gets the percentage of the closest data point.

member.summary: Specifies the attachment of the annotation.

member.summary: Coordinates of the annotation point are defined by the data series index and the data point index.

member.summary: Annotation point is specified in data coordinates.

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.Annotation.AnnotationAttachment.Relative
member.summary: Annotation point is specified as a relative position inside the control where (0,0) is the top left corner and (1,1) is the bottom right corner.

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.Annotation.AnnotationAttachment.Absolute
member.summary: The annotation point is specified in control's pixel coordinates.

member.summary: The annotation appears at the Right of the target point.

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.ChartType.Line
member.summary: Shows trends over a period of time or across categories.

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.ChartType.Scatter
member.summary: Shows patterns within the data using X and Y coordinates.

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.ChartType.LineSymbols
member.summary: Shows line chart with a symbol on each data point.

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.ChartType.Area
member.summary: Shows line chart with the area below the line filled with color.

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.ChartType.Spline
member.summary: Displays line chart that plots curves rather than angled lines through the data points.

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.ChartType.SplineSymbols
member.summary: Displays spline chart with symbols on each data point.

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.ChartType.SplineArea
member.summary: Displays spline chart with the area below the line filled with color.

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.ChartType.Bubble
member.summary: Shows Scatter chart with a third data value that determines the size of the symbol.

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.ChartType.Candlestick
member.summary: Presents items with high, low, open, and close values. The size of the wick line is determined by the High and Low values, while the size of the bar is determined by the Open and Close values. The bar is displayed using different colors, depending on whether the close value is higher or lower than the open value.

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.ChartType.HighLowOpenClose
member.summary: Displays the same information as a candlestick chart, except that opening values are displayed using lines to the left, while lines to the right indicate closing values.

member.name: T:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.ChartStackingType
member.summary: Specifies whether and how to stack the chart's data values.

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.ChartStackingType.None
member.summary: No stacking. Each series object is plotted independently.

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.ChartStackingType.Stacked
member.summary: Stacked charts show how each value contributes to the total.

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.ChartStackingType.Stacked100pc
member.summary: 100% stacked charts show how each value contributes to the total with the relative size of each series representing its contribution to the total.

member.name: T:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.ChartSeriesVisibilityType
member.summary: Specifies whether and where the ChartSeries is visible.

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.ChartSeriesVisibilityType.Visible
member.summary: The series is visible on the plot and in the legend.

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.ChartSeriesVisibilityType.Plot
member.summary: The series is visible only on the plot.

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.ChartSeriesVisibilityType.Legend
member.summary: The series is visible only in the legend.

member.name: T:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.ChartElementType
member.summary: Specifies chart element that may be found by the HitTest method.

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.ChartElementType.ChartArea
member.summary: The area within the control but outside the axes.

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.ChartLabelPosition.Left
member.summary: The labels appear to the left of the data points.

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.ChartLabelPosition.Top
member.summary: The labels appear above the data points.

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.ChartLabelPosition.Right
member.summary: The labels appear to the right of the data points.

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.ChartLabelPosition.Bottom
member.summary: The labels appear below the data points.

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.ChartLabelPosition.Center
member.summary: The labels appear centered on the data points.

member.name: T:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.PieLabelPosition
member.summary: Specifies the position of data labels on the pie chart.

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.PieLabelPosition.Inside
member.summary: The label appears inside the pie slice.

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.PieLabelPosition.Center
member.summary: The item appears at the center of the pie slice.

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.PieLabelPosition.Outside
member.summary: The item appears outside the pie slice.

member.name: T:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.ElementSizeType
member.summary: Specifies the size type for ElementSize object.

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.ElementSizeType.Percentage
member.summary: Size specified in perecents from available space.

member.name: T:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.ChartMarkerType
member.summary: Specifies the type of marker to use for the ChartMarkerType property. Applies to Scatter, LineSymbols, and SplineSymbols chart types.

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.ChartMarkerType.Dot
member.summary: Uses a circle to mark each data point.

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.ChartMarkerType.Box
member.summary: Uses a square to mark each data point.

member.name: P:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.ElementSize.SizeType
member.summary: Gets or sets the size type.

member.name: M:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.ElementSize.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current object.

member.name: M:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.ElementSize.GetHashCode
member.summary: Returns hash code of the instance.

member.name: T:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.ChartOverlappingLabels
member.summary: Specifies how to handle overlapping labels.

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.ChartOverlappingLabels.Show
member.summary: Show all labels, including overlapping ones.

member.name: T:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.FitType
member.summary: Specifies fit type for trend line.

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.FitType.Linear
member.summary: Regression fit to the equation Y(x) = C0 + C1*x.

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.FitType.Polynom
member.summary: Regression fit to the equation Y(x) = C0 + C1*x + C2*x2 + : + Cn-1*xn-1, where n - number of terms.

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.FitType.Exponent
member.summary: Regression fit to the equation Y(x) = C0 * exp( C1*x)

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.FitType.Logarithmic
member.summary: Regression fit to the equation Y(x) = C0 * ln(C1*x)

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.FitType.Power
member.summary: Regression fit to the equation Y(x) = C0 * pow(x, C1)

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.FitType.Fourier
member.summary: Regression fit to the equation Y(x) = C0 + C1 * cos(x) + C2 * sin(x) + C3 * cos(2*x) + C4 * sin(2*x) + ...

member.name: T:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.MovingAverageType
member.summary: Specifies the type of MovingAverage ChartSeries.

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.MovingAverageType.Simple
member.summary: An average of the last n values.

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.MovingAverageType.Weighted
member.summary: Weighted average of the last n values, where the weightage decreases by 1 with each previous value.

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.MovingAverageType.Exponential
member.summary: Weighted average of the last n values, where the weightage decreases exponentially with each previous value.

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.MovingAverageType.Triangular
member.summary: Weighted average of the last n values, whose result is equivalent to a double smoothed simple moving average.

member.name: T:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.Orientation
member.summary: Specifies the orientation of chart element.

member.name: T:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.RadarChartType
member.summary: Specifies the chart type for FlexRadar control.

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.RadarChartType.Line
member.summary: Shows trends over a period of time or across categories.

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.RadarChartType.Scatter
member.summary: Shows patterns within the data using X and Y coordinates.

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.RadarChartType.LineSymbols
member.summary: Shows line chart with a symbol on each data point.

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.RadarChartType.Area
member.summary: Shows line chart with the area below the line filled with color.

member.name: T:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.ChartPositionType
member.summary: Specifies the position of chart element on the chart.

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.ChartPositionType.Left
member.summary: The element appears to the left.

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.ChartPositionType.Right
member.summary: The element appears to the right.

member.name: T:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.ChartTickMarkType
member.summary: Specifies whether and where the axis tick marks appear.

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.ChartTickMarkType.Outside
member.summary: Tick marks appear outside the plot area.

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.ChartTickMarkType.Inside
member.summary: Tick marks appear inside the plot area.

member.name: P:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.FlexPie.BindingName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the property that contains the name of the data item.

member.name: P:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.FlexPie.Reversed
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines whether angles are reversed (counter-clockwise).
member.remarks: The default value is false, which causes angles to be measured in the clockwise direction.

member.name: P:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.FlexPie.Offset
member.summary: Gets or sets the offset of the slices from the pie center.
member.remarks: The offset is measured as a fraction of the pie radius.

member.name: P:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.FlexPie.InnerRadius
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the pie's inner radius.
member.remarks: The inner radius is measured as a fraction of the pie radius. The default value for this property is zero, which creates a pie. Setting this property to values greater than zero creates pies with a hole in the middle, also known as doughnut charts.

member.name: P:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.FlexPie.StartAngle
member.summary: Gets or sets the starting angle for the pie slices, in degrees.
member.remarks: Angles are measured clockwise, starting at the 9 o'clock position.

member.name: P:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.FlexPie.SliceBorderWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the border width for the pie slices.

member.name: P:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.FlexPie.SelectedItemOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets the offset of the selected slice from the pie center.
member.remarks: Offsets are measured as a fraction of the pie radius.

member.name: P:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.FlexPie.SelectedItemPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets the position of the selected slice.
member.remarks: Setting this property to a value other than 'None' causes the pie to rotate when an item is selected. Note that in order to select slices by clicking the chart, you must set the SelectionMode property to "Point".

member.name: P:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Chart.FlexPie.DataLabel
member.summary: Gets or sets the data label.

member.summary: Gets a ChartHitTestInfo object with information about the specified point.
member.returns: A ChartHitTestInfo object with information about the point.

member.summary: Fires when start angle property changes.
